oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Farrow Amusements Company at the Stoton Free Fair
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Carnivals; Fairs;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color one sheet (blue on white) announcing the Farrow Amusement Company at the Stoton Free Fair from July 7 to 10. Poster is a "fence hang over" and is designed to be displayed on a fence. It is possible that this is a sample poster made to show the client.
